definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
erhua variant of 老客[lao3 ke4]

sentences.english: We sincerely hope of fully cooper-ate with old and new cutomers. to achieve mutual progress.
sentences.chinese: 同時誠望與各新老客戶通力合作，共同拓展。

sentences.english: We warmly welcome all our customers, old and new, in and abroad, with our most sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 萬聯軸承真誠歡迎廣大國內外新老客戶。

sentences.english: We welcome the broad masses of old and new customers continue to support the Company.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎廣大的新老客戶繼續支持本公司。

sentences.english: Welcome new and old customers to consult us for copper accessories production according to your drawings.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老客戶來圖定做各類銅件。

sentences.english: We are willing to cooperate with both new and old customers to create a beautiful tomorrow in common!
sentences.chinese: 願與新老客戶精誠合作，爲開創碧水藍天共同努力。

sentences.english: Welcome to talk about the cooperation with us.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎新老客戶來電來函洽談合作事宜。

sentences.english: Successive previous customers can enjoy preferential measures, and please contact the organizing committee for details.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆老客戶可享受優惠措施，詳情請諮詢組委會。

sentences.english: Wang and the old andnew customers to join hands in creating brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 望與新老客戶攜手共創輝煌。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new and old customers to seek cooperation and win-win development.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎廣大新老客戶前來謀商合作，共贏發展。

sentences.english: We welcome new and old customers work together, mutual benefit and create a better future.
sentences.chinese: 竭誠歡迎新老客戶攜手合作，相互共贏，共創未來。

sentences.english: Au Fait is willing to create prosperous tomorrow together with customers of both new and old.
sentences.chinese: 企業願與各新老客戶，攜手共創美好的明天。

sentences.english: We would like to offer good quality products and good service to the old and new customers warmheartedly .
sentences.chinese: 我廠願熱忱爲新老客戶提供優質的產品和良好的服務。

sentences.english: The enterprises having attended the fair can enjoy preferential policies. Please contact the organizing committee for details.
sentences.chinese: 歷屆老客戶可享受優惠政策，詳情請諮詢組委會。

sentences.english: High quality, great benefit low price have earned a high praise of our customers.
sentences.chinese: 高品質，高效益，低價格，深得廣大新老客戶的好評。

sentences.english: We will sincerely continue to cooperate with old and new customers for a brilliant furture.
sentences.chinese: 我們真誠希望與廣大新老客戶繼續合作，共創商機。

sentences.english: Welcome to the new and old customers to patronize .
sentences.chinese: 歡迎廣大新老客戶前來惠顧。

definition: proprietor of a shop or restaurant/landlord/shop
signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
Xindian or Hsintien city in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
